items.title: Nio is facing heavy competition in China’s fierce EV market. Making key design decisions ‘within hours’ could help it break through
items.description: To keep ahead of the competition, “design really has to be leading edge, always looking forward, very progressive," says Kris Tomasson, Nio's VP of de...

items.title: In Wall Street’s epic comeback, unsolved market mysteries abound
items.description: The financial ecosystem is flashing warning signs for the likes of hedge funds and day traders plunging back into risk.

items.title: United to cut Newark operations as FAA issues snarl flights
items.description: The “long-simmering FAA challenges boiled over this week,” United Chief Executive Officer Scott Kirby said in a letter to customers Friday.

items.title: Exclusive: TikTok bidder calls $600 million EU fine latest example in ‘avalanche of evidence’ social media companies control too much user data
items.description: An Irish regulator fined TikTok for breaching laws meant to safeguard users’ personal information.

items.title: Berkshire’s board doesn’t see Buffett’s successor ‘as a CEO in waiting,’ lead director says. ‘He’s taking on the leadership capacity right now’
items.description: The company hosts its annual shareholder meeting this weekend highlighted by a Q&A with CEO Warren Buffett on Saturday.
